snippet: Amid Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s attacks on the gun industry, New York City sold more than 28,000 pounds of the Police Department’s spent shell casings to a Georgia ammunition store in June.
abstract: New York City sold more than 28,000 pounds of the Police Department’s spent shell casings to a Georgia ammunition store in June, despite Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's attacks on the gun industry.

byline.original: By MICHAEL WILSON and SAM ROBERTS

lead_paragraph: Amid Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s attacks on the gun industry, New York City sold more than 28,000 pounds of the Police Department’s spent shell casings to a Georgia ammunition store in June.

headline.seo: New York City Sells Police’s Spent Gun Shell Casings to Georgia Ammunition Dealer
headline.main: New York’s Used Police Shells, Reloaded for Sale
headline.print_headline: City’s Used Police Shells, Reloaded for Market in the South
